Test Description: Assess one-hop optimization -- selecting the best tile to add to the current game state
Difficulty Notes: Focusing on very easy scenarios for now, where there is just one or two hops of reasoning.
Question: Which domino should the player add to their kingdom to maximize its score? Output the following: Domino letter, Previous kingdom score, new kingdom score.
Answer: Domino: C, Previous kingdom score: 4, New kingdom score: 10
Rationale: Domino D would add 3 points from the lakes -- (1x3) instead of (0x2). Domino C would add 6 points for wheat fields -- (2x4) instead of 1x2
